item.title: 政治存在经济学问题
item.description: 大家好，欢迎阅读《奇点》时事通讯，它是来自《奇点》世界的每日内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 比特币交易员重新关注 70,000 美元，现金流入 ETF
item.description: 在加密货币周五晚些时候短暂全线下挫、美国交易所交易基金继续保持稳定流入之后，比特币交易商再次瞄准了上次在6月份达到的70,000美元价格水平。【原文：Bitcoin traders are targeting the $70,000 price level last reached in June once again after cryptocurrencies briefly dipped across the board late Friday and US exchange-traded funds continued to see steady inflows.】

item.title: Janus 和哥伦比亚公司在大选前关注被打压的抵押贷款债务
item.description: 债券市场的日益动荡和对美国通胀上升的担忧对机构抵押债券的打击尤为严重。对于 Janus Henderson 和 Columbia Threadneedle Investments 的投资者来说，这种疲软可能会带来买入这些证券的机会。【原文：Growing turmoil in the bond market and fears of rising US inflation are hitting agency mortgage bonds particularly hard. To investors at Janus Henderson and Columbia Threadneedle Investments, this weakness could present opportunities to buy the securities.】

item.title: 美国陆军与科技公司合作加速武器研发
item.description: 美国陆军参谋长在接受采访时说，美国陆军正在寻求加快武器研发和采购速度，以跟上不断发展的技术，并确保新装备在进入美国士兵手中之前不会过时。【原文：The US Army is looking to speed up weapons development and procurement to keep up with evolving technology and make sure new equipment isn’t out of date before it gets into the hands of American soldiers, the Army chief of staff said in an interview.】

item.title: 雅德尼认为美国和英国准备出售债券，债券守夜人正在集结
item.description: 华尔街资深人士埃德-亚德尼（Ed Yardeni）说，随着美国财政部准备新的债务发行计划，美国大选的临近可能预示着市场上债券守夜人的回归。【原文：Wall Street veteran Ed Yardeni says the approaching US election could augur the return of the market’s bond vigilantes as the Treasury Department readies new debt issuance plans.】

item.title: 红迪网高歌猛进，盈利面临人工智能培训数据考验
item.description: Reddit 公司的股价自今年早些时候上市以来一路高歌猛进，这家社交媒体公司在人工智能领域的独特地位将决定涨势是否会继续。【原文：Reddit Inc. shares have been on a tear since going public earlier this year, and the social-media company’s unique place in the artificial intelligence landscape will dictate whether the rally continues.】

item.title: 供过于求，德国将削减部分太阳能发电场补贴
item.description: 在可再生能源电力供过于求导致政府成本上升之后，德国计划缩小有资格获得补贴的太阳能生产商的范围。【原文：Germany plans to narrow the pool of solar producers that are eligible for subsidies after an oversupply of renewable power has led to rising costs for the government.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚自四月以来首次利用全球债券市场
item.description: 哥伦比亚今年第二次重返国际债务市场，正在考验投资者对其美元债券的胃口。【原文：Colombia is testing investor appetite for its dollar bonds, returning to international debt markets for the second time this year.】

item.title: 初创公司 Armis 着眼于 2026 年上市，以 46 亿美元估值完成一轮融资
item.description: 美国网络安全初创公司 Armis 周一表示，在完成一轮 2 亿美元的融资（估值 42 亿美元）后，该公司正准备在 2026 年进行首次公开募股。【原文：US cybersecurity startup Armis said Monday that it’s preparing for an initial public offering in 2026 after closing a $200 million funding round that valued it at $4.2 billion.】

item.title: 米莱改革使阿根廷债务摆脱困境
item.description: 随着哈维尔-米莱总统以其重塑南美第二大经济体的计划赢得债券市场的青睐，投资者不再押注阿根廷将不可避免地走向违约。【原文：Investors are no longer betting Argentina is heading inevitably to default as President Javier Milei wins over bond markets with his plans to remake South America’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 埃及称俄罗斯11月小麦装运预计推迟
item.description: 埃及供应部长谢里夫-法鲁克（Sherif Farouk）周一告诉彭博社，埃及将于 11 月开始接收俄罗斯推迟装运的 43 万吨小麦。【原文：Egypt will begin receiving a delayed Russian shipment of 430,000 tons of wheat in November, Supply Minister Sherif Farouk told Bloomberg on Monday.】

item.title: 尽管美国生物安全法案迫在眉睫，药明康德仍实现营收增长
item.description: 药明康德第三季度营收好于预期，尽管美国一项法案试图阻止中国公司获得联邦政府资助的合同。【原文：WuXi AppTec Co. posted better-than-expected third-quarter revenue despite concerns over a US bill seeking to block the Chinese company from accessing federally-funded contracts.】

item.title: 美国 40% 的奶牛感染禽流感，加州农场陷入困境
item.description: 加利福尼亚州的奶农正在努力应对不断蔓延的禽流感疫情--他们中很少有人愿意公开谈论这个问题，但没有人能够忽视这个问题。【原文：Dairy farmers in California are grappling with a steadily advancing outbreak of avian flu in their herds – a problem few of them want to talk about publicly, but that none of them can afford to ignore.】

item.title: 前高盛合伙人为直接借贷业务积累 16 亿美元资金
item.description: 私人信贷公司 5C Investment Partners 由高盛集团的两位前合伙人共同创办，在积累了 16 亿美元的高级直接借贷交易资金后，将开始进行投资。【原文：Private-credit firm 5C Investment Partners, co-founded by two former Goldman Sachs Group Inc. partners, will begin investing after amassing $1.6 billion for senior direct-lending transactions.】

item.title: Azul 与债券持有人达成 5 亿美元融资协议
item.description: Azul SA 与债券持有人签署了一项高达 5 亿美元的新融资协议，从而得以推进与出租人和零部件供应商的一项重要交易，以减少该航空公司的债务并改善其现金状况。【原文：Azul SA has inked a deal with its bondholders for up to $500 million in new financing, allowing a crucial deal to move forward with its lessors and parts suppliers that reduces the airline’s debt and boosts its cash position.】

item.title: Chrysalis 提高 Klarna 估值，金融科技公司准备上市
item.description: 在 Klarna 可能于明年首次公开募股之前，该公司的一位股东提高了对这家金融科技公司的估值。【原文：One of Klarna’s shareholders upped the valuation it assigns to the financial technology company ahead of its potential initial public offering next year.】

item.title: 臭名昭著的犯罪头目成为印度-加拿大争端中的关键人物
item.description: 在印度和加拿大因锡克分离主义领导人被暗杀而外交关系破裂之际，聚光灯现在转向了印度最臭名昭著的黑帮之一。【原文：As diplomatic relations fray between India and Canada over the assassination of a Sikh separatist leader, the spotlight is now turning to one of India’s most notorious gangsters.】

item.title: 尼日利亚与国际金融公司签署奈拉融资协议以降低货币风险
item.description: 尼日利亚中央银行和国际金融公司签署了一项促进本币融资的协议，希望在提高奈拉需求的同时，帮助企业避免外币借贷的汇率风险。【原文：Nigeria’s central bank and the International Finance Corp. signed an agreement to facilitate local-currency financing, hoping to boost demand for naira while helping firms to avoid the the exchange-rate risk of borrowing in foreign currencies.】

item.title: 特鲁多的竞争对手承诺取消许多新房的联邦销售税
item.description: 保守党领袖皮埃尔-波利瓦尔（Pierre Poilievre）表示，如果他当选总理，将取消加拿大对售价低于 100 万加元（71.97 万美元）的新房征收的 5%的全国销售税。【原文：Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre said he would remove Canada’s 5% national sales tax on new homes sold for under C$1 million ($719,700) if he’s elected prime minister.】

item.title: 房东阿德勒为高额债务再融资寻找投资者
item.description: 德国房东阿德勒集团（Adler Group SA）正在寻求为其优先债务进行再融资，作为今年早些时候重组的一部分，以降低偿债成本。【原文：German landlord Adler Group SA is looking to refinance senior debt it took out as part of a restructuring earlier this year in an effort to lower its servicing costs.】

item.title: 斯堪尼亚计划全面转向 Northvolt，收购电池公司
item.description: 大众汽车公司（Volkswagen AG）旗下的卡车制造品牌斯堪尼亚（Scania）计划为其未来的所有电动卡车配备 Northvolt 电池，这是对这家资金短缺的瑞典电池制造商的信任投票，因为该公司正在努力达成一揽子救援计划。【原文：Volkswagen AG’s truckmaking brand Scania plans to equip all its future electric trucks with Northvolt batteries, in a vote of confidence for the cash-strapped Swedish battery maker as it works to seal up a rescue package.】

item.title: 调查显示：哈里斯或特朗普执政下，美国财富都将增长
item.description:
两位候选人的股票都有望上涨。特朗普被认为对黄金和比特币更有利，而哈里斯则对住房成本略微看好。【原文：

Stocks are expected to gain under both candidates. Trump is seen as better for gold and Bitcoin, while Harris is slightly more positive for housing costs.

】

item.title: 加利福尼亚州的一个城市希望取消天然气
item.description:
自由派伯克利分校的居民将就限制在建筑物中使用燃料的第二次尝试进行投票。【原文：

Residents of liberal Berkeley will get to vote on a second attempt to curb use of the fuel in buildings.

】

item.title: 人工智能推动数据中心需求增长，DigitalBridge 收购 Yondr
item.description: 数字桥集团公司（DigitalBridge Group Inc.【原文：DigitalBridge Group Inc. has agreed to buy British data center developer and operator Yondr Group Ltd. as the investment firm seeks to profit from the boom in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利认为财政收益将缓和南非的 "垃圾 "评级
item.description: 人民币摩根士丹利（RMB Morgan Stanley）认为，南非在经历了多年增长乏力之后，经济前景不断改善，这将带来更好的财政指标，并可能很快导致其垃圾级债务的升级。【原文：South Africa’s improving economic prospects after years of lackluster growth will result in better fiscal metrics and may soon lead to an upgrade of its junk-rated debt, according to RMB Morgan Stanley.】

item.title: 飓风灾后重建取决于美国大选中心的移民问题
item.description: 东南部各州在遭受两场毁灭性飓风袭击后的重建工作有可能因关键的工人供应短缺（即移民）而停滞不前。【原文：The efforts to rebuild in Southeastern states after a pair of destructive hurricanes are at risk of being drawn out by shortages of a critical supply of workers: migrants.】

item.title: Swiggy 旨在下周中启动价值 13.5 亿美元的印度 IPO
item.description: 印度食品配送平台 Swiggy Ltd. 正寻求在首次公开募股中以每股高达 390 卢比（4.64 美元）的价格出售股票，可能会筹集 13.5 亿美元。【原文：Indian food-delivery platform Swiggy Ltd. is seeking to sell shares for as much as 390 rupees ($4.64) each in an initial public offering that may raise $1.35 billion, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: Meta 在人工智能眼镜规范化方面取得进展
item.description: 随着消费眼镜与人工智能语音助手的融合成为常态，Meta 公司的雷朋智能眼镜可能会成为本周财报中的一个亮点。但首先...【原文：Meta's Ray-Ban smart glasses could be a bright spot in its earnings print this week as the mashup of consumer eyewear and AI voice assistants becomes normal. But first...】

item.title: 科氏签署首笔以回收率承诺为支撑的锂交易
item.description: 科氏公司（Koch）与美国一家锂风险投资公司签署了一项协议，将提供一项业界首创的技术，保证利用其新的提取方法从咸水中回收至少 95% 的金属。【原文：Koch, Inc. signed a deal with a US lithium venture to provide technology that includes an industry-first guarantee of recovering at least 95% of the metal from salty water using its new extraction methods.】

item.title: 德鲁肯米勒、科菲、彼得菲支持人工智能市场研究公司
item.description: 斯坦利-德鲁肯米勒（Stanley Druckenmiller）、格雷格-科菲（Greg Coffey）和托马斯-彼得菲（Thomas Peterffy）等金融界重量级人物参与了人工智能市场研究公司 Reflexivity 的 3000 万美元融资，这是华尔街如何利用人工智能趋势的最新迹象。【原文：In the latest sign of how Wall Street is playing the AI trend, financial heavyweights Stanley Druckenmiller, Greg Coffey and Thomas Peterffy are among those participating in a $30 million funding round for Reflexivity, an AI market-research firm.】
